mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, pw, name, nickName, address, birth, gender, email, phone) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM member WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(nickname) FROM member WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(email) FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, nickname, email FROM member WHERE id = #{id} AND nickname = #{nickname} AND email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pw = #{tempPw} WHERE id = #{id}
